attributes.action: force banks to pass on the full Bank of England Interest Rate cuts to  their mortgage holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: house owners with large mortgages need the full bank of England interest rate cut.   This would makes a huge difference in what most families would have to spend each month.  This would be the best way to get people spending and give us confidence in the government.  We helped them now it is the banks turn to help us.  My mortgage has only gone down by half percent - not good enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
